lenders.name: xueyun

But we are currently short of 600,000 US dollars to pay our fees of development, advertizement and maintenance, and also other fees such as server, bandwidth, labor costs, etc.
lenders.occupational_info: I am working with a whole team, which successfully developed the structure of the website and achieved our initial goal. Since China has a huge potential market of over 600 cities, so we are full of confidence to make this website as popular as www.craiqslist.org to United States.

lenders.occupational_info: I bring disparate groups/organizations/people together to address the needs of the Roma in Slovakia and the Czech Republic.

lenders.name: Jessica
lenders.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to live in a country of luxury and wealth. Though I can't change the entire world, I can share my good fortune and hopefully help others flourish.
lenders.occupational_info: I currently work for a small state university while going to school. When I'm finished, I will be teaching elementary school!

lenders.name: Kathy
The Sweet Unfolding
lenders.loan_because: Owning our own business has long been our favorite dream, and we're thrilled that it is now a reality. It means a lot to us to contribute to the entrepreneurial dreams of others.
lenders.occupational_info: The Sweet Unfolding is an online wedding and event boutique that specializes in earth-friendly and socially conscious products and business practices.

lenders.name: Sabina
lenders.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lenders.name: Gaiam
lenders.loan_because: Gaiam is dedicated to the success of a global economy where artisans and entrepreneurs from around the world can earn a fair wage making and marketing healthy, quality products.
lenders.occupational_info: Founded in Boulder, Colorado in 1988, Gaiam is a provider of information, goods and services to customers who value the environment, a sustainable economy, healthy lifestyles, alternative healthcare and personal development. See our Fair Trade product section here: http://www.gaiam.com/category/fair-trade.do

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I can.
lenders.occupational_info: I study entrepreneurial management and finance at the Wharton School of Business and work as a consultant in the Washington DC area.

lenders.name: Yolene
lenders.loan_because: I am living in the US but  originated from a developping country where small businesses are the mainstay of the economy.  Where ever they are in the world,  young entrepreneurs deserve a lot of support.
lenders.occupational_info: I am presently the owner-manager of "Arts and Glamour", a former family run business, facilitating  introduction abroad of paintings, hand-crafted artifacts, fashion items and accessories.  Now Arts and Glamour is a internet run general wholesale store.

lenders.name: Carl
lenders.loan_because: I have been blessed during my time on earth and do not take it for granted.  And I loan because it's the most direct way for me to connect in the most human way with other brother's and sisters around the globe that truly need our help.
lenders.occupational_info: Part of my work is to learn; so that I can continue to teach my children; and pass on my knowledge to the next fellow man or woman.

lenders.name: Paul
lenders.loan_because: I've been blessed want to share directly with others who need some help.
lenders.occupational_info: Work for NBC Universal.

lenders.name: Steve
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage entrepreneurs around the globe.
lenders.occupational_info: Entrepreneur

lenders.name: Laurel

lenders.name: Amanda
lenders.loan_because: I want to help those that want to help themselves
lenders.occupational_info: improving quality of life through the use of medicine

lenders.name: Tyler
lenders.loan_because: of my small business experience and my experience in the small business sector in the US Peace Corps.  The toughest job to have is a private business.  I'm fortunate enough to be able to offer some $, but they are doing all the work.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a teacher of middle school mathematics in an English speaking private school in Hong Kong.

lenders.name: Sis Chrys
lenders.loan_because: I enjoy giving what I can to others.  I will never be rich, but I will help when and where I can.
lenders.occupational_info: When someone has a problem with getting something on their computer to work they call me.

lenders.name: Stephen
lenders.loan_because: I got to where I am by a combination of my own hard work and the help of others.  This is one way I can pay back the world for what I have received and help others who are working hard towards their dreams.
lenders.occupational_info: I program Internet websites.

lenders.name: Sonja
lenders.loan_because: I want to make a difference for other women in less privileged countries.
lenders.occupational_info: I help build rockets that fly into space and the satellites that they carry.

lenders.name: Tonia
lenders.loan_because: I am my brother's keeper. We all should be.

lenders.name: Andrew
lenders.loan_because: I wanted to bless others because I have been blessed.

lenders.name: Ines
lenders.loan_because: My previous work in international development was often disconnected from the people who were meant to benefit from my efforts. This is an easy and innovative way to both help someone *and* achieve the personal satisfaction of witnessing direct impacts.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: I believe in the value of self promotion and self respect. A leg up, not a handout.

lenders.occupational_info: www.eximo.nl

lenders.name: Dave
lenders.loan_because: It matters....
lenders.occupational_info: I teach business at a University based in Cambridge, MA.

lenders.name: Derrick
lenders.loan_because: I have traveled the world working on the world's largest sporting events and have seen the need to help others.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in event operations on events like FIFA World Cup, Super Bowls, NASCAR and the Olympics.  I've had the fortune to work with athletes from all over the world and have shared many fun, enriching experiences with them.

lenders.name: Mark Whiting
lenders.loan_because: I want to do my part to make the world a better place but murder is illegal.
lenders.occupational_info: I help people and organisations make better decisions by using design research and methods.

lenders.name: Linda
lenders.loan_because: I believe women helping women is the greatest force for change in this world!
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a US Govt Subcontractor, administering US Navy contracts.

lenders.name: Rocky and Julie
lenders.loan_because: I love being able to help someone get a foothold in life to be able to feed their family and get supplies needed to live.

lenders.name: Brian
lenders.loan_because: I am always searching for responsible ways to share what I have without imposing my ideals on indigenous peoples. Micro-lending through local organizations is the best way I've found so far!
lenders.occupational_info: I am an Associate Pastor at a United Methodist Church

lenders.name: mary ellen
lenders.occupational_info: I design homes

lenders.name: Charles
lenders.loan_because:
I can.

There isn't a fixed amount of wealth in the world, and I'm all in favour of helping people to help themselves to create more of it.

lenders.name: Cady
lenders.loan_because: It makes me feel like I am making somebody happy and helping them achieve their dreams. I feel more connected to the world this way. It also makes me feel grateful for my life and what I have in my life.
lenders.occupational_info: I teach fifth grade (10 and 11 year-olds)  in Saratoga, CA  in the United States of America.

lenders.name: Julie
lenders.loan_because: I think microfinance is one of the only ways to empower impoverished people and significantly improve the economies of the developing counties in which they live.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at Davidson College, a liberal arts school in North Carolina.  During my time here, I hope to educate my peers about microcredit through our growing microfinance club which began in 2007.

lenders.name: Scott
lenders.loan_because: I want to encourage capitalism, entrepreneurship, risk taking and trade, and enhance the opportunities people have made for themselves.
lenders.occupational_info: I advise governments and companies about transport strategy and policy.

lenders.name: Rachel
lenders.loan_because: I care.

lenders.name: Joshua
lenders.loan_because: I love my neighbor as myself
lenders.occupational_info: I serve

lenders.name: J. Mark
lenders.loan_because: my Lord incarnate brings healing to every facet of poverty.
lenders.occupational_info: I am a humanitarian educator at heart.  At present, I work in a center for economic development that develops strategies and offers training for the local church to empower the poor economically, socially, and spiritually.

lenders.name: Mariela
lenders.loan_because:
I have a fervent interest in international development and microfinance, especially as it applies to Latin America. Having traveled, studied, and volunteered abroad, as well as having been born and raised abroad, I feel a particularly strong imperative to foster the kind of change that puts lesser-developed communities at the forefront of development, through it building a more equitable global society.

Becoming a Kiva Fellow in 2011 brought me closer to a shared sense of purpose and deeper into the fabric of Kiva and through it I was not only able to gain essential in the field experience in microfinance, but I was also exposed to the wonderfully entrepreneurial spirit of the people living in developing communities. More than anything, I was impressed with the understanding that it is not a lack of innovation, desire, or drive that keeps people living in sub-standard conditions, but rather a lack of access to resources.
lenders.occupational_info: Mandela Marketplace is a non-profit organization that works in partnership with local residents, family farmers, and community-based businesses to improve health, create wealth, and build assets through cooperative food enterprises in low income communities.

lenders.name: Kathika
lenders.loan_because: I think it's important to help entrepreneurs in developing countries build business on their own.
lenders.occupational_info: I'm a travel blogger and I write about interesting places across the globe for people to explore

lenders.name: Jane
lenders.loan_because:
Do not take life too seriously. You will never get out of it alive.
--Elbert Hubbard
lenders.occupational_info: I make software for the Medical field.

lenders.name: Jide
lenders.loan_because: I believe we're stronger working together than we are apart.
lenders.occupational_info: I work as a computer technician. I support large networks of computers and users to provide stable systems and pleasant work experiences.

lenders.name: Bacem
lenders.loan_because: Sharing and helping others makes this world a better place.
lenders.occupational_info: I work in the Medical Devices industry

lenders.name: Boutique Mix and MiMi
lenders.loan_because: As a small business owner myself, I understand that every single cent counts towards supporting the dreams of entrepreneurs whose main goal is to improve the lives of their families and their communities.

lenders.loan_because: having money without making a difference is valueless money

lenders.occupational_info: I help people to pursue and achieve their dreams through building teams and creating partnerships of cooperation and love.

lenders.name: RMRG Hidalgo
lenders.loan_because: why not?!

lenders.name: Adam & Joy
lenders.loan_because: we have been blessed by God and want to be a blessing to others in return.  We pray that the love of Jesus Christ be shown through our giving.

lenders.name: Pat
lenders.loan_because: I feel a connection to other women who work with their hands to make beautiful things.
lenders.occupational_info: I made draperies, pillows, bedding and custom slipcovers for furniture.  My work is all custom made one of a kind pieces.  I have some good connections in the decorating business.

lenders.loan_because: helping people to grow their businesses will reduce poverty and empower individuals. Small businesses not only help the owner, but the whole community.
lenders.occupational_info: software developer

lenders.occupational_info: As a fashion designer, my creations aspire to be a reflection of my emotional connection with the environment and people, while contributing to positive change.

lenders.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Texas at Austin. I am currently doing a dual-degree in Urban Studies and Civil Engineering.

lenders.name: Samantha
lenders.loan_because: I have the opportunity to be an entrepreneur with my craft (sewing) and want to provide the same opportunity to others.

lenders.name: Beach Money™
lenders.loan_because: Beach Money™, written by Jordan Adler, is a book about creating success in network marketing.  It only seemed right to use 100% of the profits from the sale of this book to empower entrepreneurs all over the world.

lenders.occupational_info: I'm 59, my wife and I have 2 sons and 5 grandkids. I work nights stocking shelves in a supermarket.

lenders.occupational_info: Now I volunteer at church, on political campaigns and in my community.

lenders.name: Marie-Jeanne
lenders.loan_because: This whole idea is so beautiful, one can only be enthusiastic to make it live!  Kiva gives me  the opportunity to concretely help someone "over there". And it also offers me a real feeling of belonging to a worlwide community.

lenders.name: Martyn
lenders.loan_because: Stupid not to..Given the opportunity these folks will work their way out of poverty. For every one you help get going think of their extended family and friends you are also helping. It also gives them dignity and a sense of fulfilment in doing it !
lenders.occupational_info: small scale serial entrepreneur..fingers in pies, multiple revenue streams. I do a bit of this and that which includes teaching, selling on the internet, and a few other things.

lenders.name: Jennifer
lenders.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance to improve their lot in life

lenders.occupational_info: I work in network and computer security. The goal is to basically protect data and information or money from electronic theft.

lenders.name: Pilo
lenders.loan_because: I am privileged to be able to help people who are helping themselves.

lenders.name: Lin
lenders.loan_because: I love to encourage people who are working to better themselves and their situation. I've worked outside my home since I was 11. I started my first full-time business in 1988. I'm drawn to people who take charge of their situation and add value to the world.
lenders.occupational_info: I write how-to books and publish them on the Internet. Every day I write blogs or articles to promote my work on the Internet, so more people can learn about it and how to improve their lives. This is how I support myself and others.

lenders.name: Chris
lenders.loan_because: I want to help people improve their lives by supporting themselves and their families by their own means.  As the bible says it is better to teach a man to fish....

lenders.name: Mattias

lenders.occupational_info: I am a Real Estate Agent and I love helping people find their dream home!

lenders.loan_because: I was in business for myself and could not have grown and been successful without credit. I have to do the same for others.
lenders.occupational_info: I am doing special events for a local needlework store and volunteer work, including presentations on micro finance.

lenders.name: Jonas
lenders.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is a beautiful thing, especially if it also benefit ones community. If there is just a slight chance I can help entrepreneurs around the world do this I'm all in.
lenders.occupational_info: Former CEO of JayCut, sold to BlackBerry in 2011. Innovation and self-exploration is what makes my heart jump...oh!

lenders.name: John

lenders.name: Rebecca
lenders.loan_because: This is the kind of globalization the world needs!
lenders.occupational_info: I am now disabled and have had to give up the work I did in the past.  I am now going to school to develop skills that will enable me to work again, hopefully teaching English to Spanish speakers. I will not earn a lot of money, but enough to make my life more comfortable. In my country, I am poor. But I am not as poor as most of the people who seek loans.

lenders.name: Claire
lenders.loan_because: it makes me happy

lenders.name: Martyn
lenders.loan_because: helping people to help themselves and build their immediate community has a more positive and sustainable impact than simply throwing money at a problem.

lenders.name: Mark
lenders.loan_because: I like to help.
lenders.occupational_info: I work for a construction company that builds residential homes.

lenders.name: John
lenders.loan_because: we donate 10% of our profits to charity and Kiva is a great way to help people.
lenders.occupational_info: We provide environmental consulting services.

lenders.name: Eva
lenders.loan_because: I can make a big difference with a little bit of money.

lenders.name: Alicia

lenders.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lenders.name: Rebecca

We have so much in the United States to share with others.  I hope to bring hope and health to others by sharing a little of what i have. I am loaning our Stimulus payment and any gratuities I may receive as a tax preparer.
lenders.occupational_info: I am retired, take care of my home, and sometimes work as an AARP volunteer tax preparer.

lenders.name: Michael
